languages.text: "Среди недавних ваших свершений выделяются подавление мятежа на Янусе, схватка со слугами {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Архиврага{/g} на Кьяве Гамма и, конечно, особый интерес, питаемый к вам {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}друкари{/g}. Их и обсудим". {n}Произнеся это, инквизитор бросает на вас внимательный взгляд исподлобья — словно игрок в {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}регицид{/g}, сделавший первый ход и наблюдающий за реакцией оппонента.{/n}

"What stands out from your recent accomplishments is the suppression of a rebellion on Janus, the battle against the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}'s minions on Kiava Gamma, and, of course, the unusual interest the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} have shown in you. Then that is what we will discuss." {n}After saying these words, he shoots you a searching look from under his brows — like a {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}regicide{/g} player who just made the first move and is now watching for his opponent's reaction.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Среди недавних ваших свершений выделяются подавление мятежа на Янусе, схватка со слугами {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Архиврага{/g} на Кьяве Гамма и, конечно, особый интерес, питаемый к вам {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}друкари{/g}. Их и обсудим". {n}Произнеся это, инквизитор бросает на вас внимательный взгляд исподлобья — словно игрок в {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}регицид{/g}, сделавший первый ход и наблюдающий за реакцией оппонента.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "What stands out from your recent accomplishments is the suppression of a rebellion on Janus, the battle against the Archenemy's minions on Kiava Gamma, and, of course, the unusual interest the Drukhari have shown in you. Then that is what we will discuss." {n}After saying these words, he shoots you a searching look from under his brows — like a regicide player who just made the first move and is now watching his opponent's reaction.{/n}

Then that is what we will discuss." {n}After saying these words, he shoots you a searching look from under his brows — like a {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}regicide{/g} player who just made the first move and is now watching for his opponent's reaction.{/n}

languages.text: 「最近の業績の中で際立っているのが、ヤヌスの反乱制圧、キアヴァ・ガンマにおける{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}渾沌の勢力{/g}の手先との戦闘、それともちろん、{g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}デュカーリ{/g}がお前に示した異常なまでの興味。さあ、それらを議題に話そうじゃないか」{n}一通りの言葉を吐き出すと、カルカサルは探るような上目遣いであなたを射貫く。さながら最初の行動を起こしたばかりの{g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}レジサイド{/g}実行犯が機会をうかがっているかのようである。{/n}
languages.original_text: "What stands out from your recent accomplishments is the suppression of a rebellion on Janus, the battle against the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}'s minions on Kiava Gamma, and, of course, the unusual interest the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} have shown in you. Then that is what we will discuss." {n}After saying these words, he shoots you a searching look from under his brows — like a {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}regicide{/g} player who just made the first move and is now watching for his opponent's reaction.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「最近の業績の中で際立っているのが、ヤヌスの反乱制圧、キアヴァ・ガンマにおける{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}渾沌の勢力{/g}の手先との戦闘、それともちろん、{g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}デュカーリ{/g}がお前に示した異常なまでの興味。さあ、それらを議題に話そうじゃないか」{n}一通りの言葉を吐き出すと、カルカサルは探るような上目遣いであなたを射貫く。さながら最初の行動を起こしたばかりの{g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}レジサイド{/g}実行犯が機会をうかがっているかのようである。{/n}

languages.original_text: "What stands out from your recent accomplishments is the suppression of a rebellion on Janus, the battle against the Archenemy's minions on Kiava Gamma, and, of course, the unusual interest the Drukhari have shown in you. Then that is what we will discuss." {n}After saying these words, he shoots you a searching look from under his brows — like a regicide player who just made the first move and is now watching for his opponent's reaction.{/n}

languages.text: “你最近引人注目的事情，包括镇压了加努斯的叛乱，在基亚瓦伽马星上与{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}混沌大敌{/g}的爪牙大战一场。当然，还有{g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}黑暗灵族{/g}对你表现出了不同寻常的兴趣。这些就是我今天想和你谈谈的话题。”{n}说完这段话后，他那浓眉之下的鹰目紧紧地盯着你，仿佛{g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}弑君棋{/g}的棋手走出第一步之后，开始观察对手的反应。{/n}
languages.original_text: "What stands out from your recent accomplishments is the suppression of a rebellion on Janus, the battle against the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}'s minions on Kiava Gamma, and, of course, the unusual interest the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} have shown in you. Then that is what we will discuss." {n}After saying these words, he shoots you a searching look from under his brows — like a {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}regicide{/g} player who just made the first move and is now watching for his opponent's reaction.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你最近引人注目的事情，包括镇压了加努斯的叛乱，在基亚瓦伽马星上与{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}混沌大敌{/g}的爪牙大战一场。当然，还有{g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}黑暗灵族{/g}对你表现出了不同寻常的兴趣。这些就是我今天想和你谈谈的话题。”{n}说完这段话后，他那浓眉之下的鹰目紧紧地盯着你，仿佛{g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}弑君棋{/g}的棋手走出第一步之后，开始观察对手的反应。{/n}

languages.text: «De entre sus acciones recientes destacan el haber sofocado una rebelión en Janus, la batalla contra los sirvientes del {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archienemigo{/g} en Kiava Gamma y, naturalmente, el singular interés que despierta en los {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}. Estos son los asuntos que necesitamos considerar». {n}Dicho esto, te lanza una mirada inquisitiva, como la de un jugador de {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}regicidio{/g} que acaba de empezar la partida y estudia la reacción de su oponente.{/n}
languages.original_text: "What stands out from your recent accomplishments is the suppression of a rebellion on Janus, the battle against the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}'s minions on Kiava Gamma, and, of course, the unusual interest the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} have shown in you. Then that is what we will discuss." {n}After saying these words, he shoots you a searching look from under his brows — like a {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}regicide{/g} player who just made the first move and is now watching for his opponent's reaction.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «De entre sus acciones recientes destacan el haber sofocado una rebelión en Janus, la batalla contra los sirvientes del {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archienemigo{/g} en Kiava Gamma y, naturalmente, el singular interés que despierta en los {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}. Estos son los asuntos que necesitamos considerar». {n}Dicho esto, te lanza una mirada inquisitiva, como la de un jugador de {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}regicidio{/g} que acaba de empezar la partida y estudia la reacción de su oponente.{/n}

languages.text: « Parmi vos récents exploits, vous avez réprimé une rébellion sur Janus, affronté les sbires du {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Grand Ennemi{/g} sur Kiava Gamma et, bien sûr, fait l'objet d'attentions toutes particulières de la part des {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukharis{/g}. C'est donc de cela que nous allons discuter. » {n}Sur ces mots, il vous lance le regard scrutateur d'un joueur de {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}régicide{/g} qui, après avoir avancé son premier pion, observerait son adversaire dans l'attente de sa réaction.{/n}
languages.original_text: "What stands out from your recent accomplishments is the suppression of a rebellion on Janus, the battle against the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}'s minions on Kiava Gamma, and, of course, the unusual interest the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} have shown in you. Then that is what we will discuss." {n}After saying these words, he shoots you a searching look from under his brows — like a {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}regicide{/g} player who just made the first move and is now watching for his opponent's reaction.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Parmi vos récents exploits, vous avez réprimé une rébellion sur Janus, affronté les sbires du {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Grand Ennemi{/g} sur Kiava Gamma et, bien sûr, fait l'objet d'attentions toutes particulières de la part des {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukharis{/g}. C'est donc de cela que nous allons discuter. » {n}Sur ces mots, il vous lance le regard scrutateur d'un joueur de {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}régicide{/g} qui, après avoir avancé son premier pion, observerait son adversaire dans l'attente de sa réaction.{/n}

languages.text: "Eure herausragenden Leistungen der letzten Zeit sind die Niederschlagung einer Rebellion auf Janus, der Kampf gegen die Lakaien des {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Erzfeinds{/g} auf Kiava Gamma und natürlich das ungewöhnliche Interesse der {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} an Euch. Und über all das werden wir jetzt sprechen." {n}Nach diesen Worten wirft er dir aus zusammengekniffenen Augen einen prüfenden Blick zu – wie ein {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}Königsmord{/g}-Spieler, der den ersten Zug gemacht hat und nun die Reaktion seines Gegners beobachtet.{/n}
languages.original_text: "What stands out from your recent accomplishments is the suppression of a rebellion on Janus, the battle against the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}'s minions on Kiava Gamma, and, of course, the unusual interest the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} have shown in you. Then that is what we will discuss." {n}After saying these words, he shoots you a searching look from under his brows — like a {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}regicide{/g} player who just made the first move and is now watching for his opponent's reaction.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Eure herausragenden Leistungen der letzten Zeit sind die Niederschlagung einer Rebellion auf Janus, der Kampf gegen die Lakaien des {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Erzfeinds{/g} auf Kiava Gamma und natürlich das ungewöhnliche Interesse der {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} an Euch. Und über all das werden wir jetzt sprechen." {n}Nach diesen Worten wirft er dir aus zusammengekniffenen Augen einen prüfenden Blick zu – wie ein {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}Königsmord{/g}-Spieler, der den ersten Zug gemacht hat und nun die Reaktion seines Gegners beobachtet.{/n}

languages.text: "Son dönemdeki başarıların arasında şunlar öne çıkıyor: Janus'taki bir isyanın bastırılması, Kiava Gama'da {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Şerbaşı'nın{/g} birliklerine karşı giriştiğin mücadele ve elbette {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukharilerin{/g} sana gösterdiği olağan dışı ilgi. Şimdi bunları konuşacağız." {n}Bu sözleri sarf ettikten sonra, {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}kral katili{/g} oyununda ilk hamleyi yapmış ve rakibinin nasıl reaksiyon göstereceğini izleyen bir oyuncu misali kaşlarının arasından sana sorgulayıcı bir bakış atıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "What stands out from your recent accomplishments is the suppression of a rebellion on Janus, the battle against the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}'s minions on Kiava Gamma, and, of course, the unusual interest the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} have shown in you. Then that is what we will discuss." {n}After saying these words, he shoots you a searching look from under his brows — like a {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}regicide{/g} player who just made the first move and is now watching for his opponent's reaction.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Son dönemdeki başarıların arasında şunlar öne çıkıyor: Janus'taki bir isyanın bastırılması, Kiava Gama'da {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Şerbaşı{/g}'nın birliklerine karşı giriştiğin mücadele ve elbette {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}'nin sana gösterdiği olağan dışı ilgi. Öyleyse konuşacağımız şeyler de bunlardır." {n}Bu sözleri sarf ettikten sonra kaşlarının arasından sana sorgulayıcı bir bakış atıyor. Sanki {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}kral katili{/g} oyununda ilk hamleyi yapmış ve rakibinin nasıl reaksiyon göstereceğini izleyen bir oyuncu gibi.{/n}
